title: 3BR, 2BA + Dishwasher & Patio. No Broker Fee! Amazing Price!
posting_body: ['Please note: This is not available for a short term rental.', '12 month leases only!', 'W 103rd St & Central Park West', 'Pets', 'No Laundry', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Street Parking', 'Outdoor Space', 'Dishwasher', 'High Ceilings', 'Video Tour: https://youtu.be/UZuwWKMLHHc', 'Only 1 block to the A, B, C trains!', '<URL> gives our landlord paid broker commission of $5,050 to you, reducing your monthly rent to $5,329 (Gross rent is $5,750).', 'Padspin is the only company in the US that does this.', 'We are fighting to keep rents low and get rid of brokers.', 'Large and Sunny 3 Bedroom with dishwasher and patio located in the heart of UWS.', 'Steps from multiple train lines, laundromat, shops, galleries, restaurants, lounges, cafes, etc.', 'Priced to rent immediately.', 'If interested contact right away to schedule a viewing before it goes.', 'Requirements', '1.', 'Everyone on lease has a combined annual income of at least $213,000.', '2.', 'Everyone on lease has a credit score of at least 670.', '3.', 'Or you have a guarantor(s) with credit score(s) of at least 685 and combined annual income of at least $288,000.', '4.', 'Or you have savings of 4 months worth of rent or more']
